level.heading: ARCHITECTURAL AND INDUSTRIAL MAINTENANCE COATING – EXEMPTIONS (§ 20-775)

level.text: Sections 773 through 778 do not apply to:
Any architectural coating that is sold or manufactured for use outside of the District of Columbia or for shipment to other manufacturers for reformulation or repackaging;
Any architectural coating that is sold in a container with a volume of one liter (1 L) or one and fifty-seven hundredths quarts (1.057 q.) or less.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11286, 11402 (December 30, 2011).
